pages.text: $(li)The Illager's Bane enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l).$(br)$(li)A weapon with this enchantment applied does additional damage to Illager creatures like $(l:patchouli:illagers/evoker)Evokers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/furantur)Furanturs$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:illagers/black_iron_golem)Black Iron Golems$(/l).
pages.title: Illager's Bane

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level VIII.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IX of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_illagers_bane)Ancient Tome (Illager's Bane)$(/l).
